name: Whalla Labs
description:
Whalla Labs is a software development company creating stunning web & mobile apps for Android, iOS, Windows Universal Apps and wearables.
We supply our customers not only with agile software development process but also with business development and marketing - this gives us ability to better understand our customers' needs and build better products for them.
We always keep our standards high, which led us to develop apps that were downloaded by millions of users.
 
Cogision is a UX Agency and a part of Whalla Labs' brand. Their main focus lies in User Experience research and design, conducting workshops with clients and understanding users, to craft the best UX possible.
 
Do you have an app idea or need help with existing one? Let's talk.​
